name: A Journey of a Dice
description:
Description

This is a story about a dice. Despite the other dices in your hood, this dice is special, and powerful more than you think

This dice has the ability to control the tile's fate, by using it's advanced mechanics that make new numbers that did not exist on any other dice before

Find your way through various challenges in order to become the dice you were supposed to be!

This is a puzzle game where you have to roll the dice, strategically, to find your own path to victory!

So, quite literally, roll the dice, and have fun!

Made With:

- Godot

- Blender

Assets Used:

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/tower-defense-kit

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/casino-audio

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/ui-audio
